data.eml:eml: Taxonomic review of the genera Trigoniophthalmus Verhoeff and Coryphophthalmus Verhoeff (Archaeognatha, Machilidae) with descriptions of two new species of the genus Coryphophthalmus from Serbia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kaplin, Vladimir (2019): Taxonomic review of the genera Trigoniophthalmus Verhoeff and Coryphophthalmus Verhoeff (Archaeognatha, Machilidae) with descriptions of two new species of the genus Coryphophthalmus from Serbia. Zootaxa 4661 (2): 371-384, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4661.2.6
